title:
Mary McLeod Bethune Council House National Historic Site
: Donate
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Donate            Donate          The Mary McLeod Bethune Council House National Historic Site accepts donations from individuals, families, organizations, foundations, corporations, businesses, associations and other entities. Your contribution will be used to enhance visitor services and support resource protection and programs throughout the park. The generosity of our citizens through their tax dollars and their donations helps to sustain America's national parks. We thank you for your support!           Â       You may also donate through our Congressionally-chartered national philanthropic partner, the National Park Foundation. The National Park Foundation, in partnership with the National Park Service, enriches America's national parks and programs through private support, safeguarding our heritage and inspiring generations of national park enthusiasts.
